categories.name: mission
categories.title: Point of care testing (POCT)
categories.description: Our product offering includes a variety of urine reagent test strips, urine analyzers and handheld devices for the measurement of cholesterol, coagulation and hemoglobin.

categories.description: Nucleic Acid Extraction System and PCR quantitative test kits for HBV, HCV, HPV 16/18, HPV Genotyping, TB and HLA-B27.

categories.title: ELISA
categories.description: Our product offering includes ELISA tests for Infectious Disease, ToRCH, Allergen, Thyroid, Fertilty and Tumor Markers.

categories.name: acon
categories.title: Lateral Flow Rapid Test
categories.description: Reliable qualitative screening for pregnancy, cancer markers and infectious disease including our SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) antibody test.

categories.name: on-call

categories.description: Carefully designed for accuracy and reliability, the On Call® Blood Glucose Meter Family has helped millions of patients worldwide effectively manage their glucose levels.

categories.name: distinct
categories.title: Pregnancy Rapid Tests

categories.name: flowflex
categories.title: Our newest brand
categories.description: FlowflexTM is the newest brand addition to the ACON product portfolio.  The Flowflex SARS-CoV-2 Rapid Antigen Test is the first in this family of lateral flow testing products.

categories.name: Cypress
categories.title: Clinical laboratory specialist for 27 years
categories.description: Our solutions screen and monitor the most common conditions quickly and clearly. We enable doctors to understand and choose appropriate treatments.

products.name: Promotor® 960 Real Time PCR System
products.caption: The 960 Real-Time PCR System enables you to perform real-time, onboard PCR amplification, reverse transcription-PCR, fluorescence detection, and data analysis. After monitoring fluorescence during nucleic acid amplification, results can be analyzed.
products.description: The 960 Real-Time PCR System enables you to perform real-time, onboard PCR amplification, reverse transcription-PCR, fluorescence detection, and data analysis. After monitoring fluorescence during nucleic acid amplification, results can be analyzed.
bullet_points: Detection of 1 copy of template in a 50 μL reaction
No need for ROX reference dye
No crosstalk between well to well due to special optical system design

tableRows.specifications: Channel 1: FAM, SYBR Green,Channel 2: VIC, HEX, JOE, TET,Channel 3: ROX, Texas Red; Channel 4: CY5
Additional dyes within the wavelength range compatible with the filters are supported
Standard optical 0.2 mL 96-well plates (Semi-skirted, Non-skirted),8-strip 0.2 mL tubes,0.2 mL optical tubes
Detection of 1 copy of template in a 50 μL reaction
Comparative Ct,Standard Curve,Relative Standard Curve,Allelic Discrimination

products.name: ACON® SARS-CoV-2 IgG/IgM Rapid Test
products.caption: The SARS-CoV-2 IgG/IgM Rapid Test is a lateral flow chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of antibodies (IgG and IgM) to SARS-CoV-2 in human serum, plasma, or whole blood.
products.description: The SARS-CoV-2 IgG/IgM Rapid Test is a lateral flow chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of antibodies (IgG and IgM) to SARS-CoV-2 in human serum, plasma, or whole blood.

products.name: Promotor® NES-32 Nucleic Acid Extraction Kit
products.caption: The semi-automatic NES-32 nucleic acid extraction system is efficient, easy to operate and offers a throughput of 32 samples per run
products.description: The semi-automatic NES-32 nucleic acid extraction system is efficient, easy to operate and offers a throughput of 32 samples per run. Using magnetic bead technology, the NES-32 can process a variety of specimens, including tissue, blood and other bodily fluids.
bullet_points: Specimens include: Serum, plasma, swab and sputum
The 32 test kit includes 2 Extraction Plates,4 Tip Combs,1 x 700 µL Proteinase K,1 x 700 µL Carrier RNA

products.name: SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR Test Kit
products.caption: Qualitative detection of nucleic acid from SARS-CoV-2 in oropharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal swab and deepcough sputum specimens collected from individuals suspected of SARS-CoV-2 by their healthcare provider
products.description: Qualitative detection of nucleic acid from SARS-CoV-2 in oropharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal swab and deep cough sputum specimens collected from individuals suspected of SARS-CoV-2 by their healthcare provider.Clinical correlation with patient history and other diagnostic information is necessary to determine patient infection status.
bullet_points: Specimens include Oropharyngeal and nasopharyngeal swabs, and deep cough sputum specimens
Qualitative detection of nucleic acids from SARS-CoV-2
Full-process controls with negative, positive and internal controls

tableRows.specifications: Real-Time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR)
Oropharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal swab and deep cough sputum

products.name: Promotor® HBV Quantitative PCR Test Kit(Real time)
products.caption: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis B virus in HBV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 20 IU/mL.
products.description: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis B virus in HBV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 20 IU/mL, this test kit is an excellent choice for HBV infection diagnosis, treatment decision making and viral load monitoring during antiviral therapy.
bullet_points: Internal quality control: prevents false-negative results
Specificity: no cross-reactivity with HAV, HCV, HEV and HIV

products.name: Promotor® HCV Quantitative PCR Test Kit
products.caption: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis C virus in HCV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 30 IU/mL.
products.description: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis C virus in HCV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 30 IU/mL, this test kit is an excellent choice for HCV infection diagnosis, treatment decision making and viral load monitoring during antiviral therapy.
bullet_points: Internal quality control: prevents false-negative results
Specificity: no cross-reactivity with HAV, HBV, HEV and HIV

products.name: HPV 16/18 Genotype PCR Test Kit
products.caption: This real-time PCR test kit is for qualitative detection of HPV types 16 and 18 (high-risk types) in cervical specimens.
products.description: Human papillomavirus types 16 and 18 (high-risk types) are responsible for about 70% of all cervical cancer cases worldwide. This real-time PCR test kit is for qualitative detection of HPV types 16 and 18 in cervical specimens. It can be used alongside other cervical cancer screening or diagnostic methods, contributing to more accurate medical information and better treatment decisions. It can also be used during physical examinations to identify high-risk HPV infections.
bullet_points: Specificity: no cross-reactivity with CT, UU, NG and other types of HPV
Less or equal to 30 min. extraction and 1-hour PCR (extraction reagent included)

products.name: TB PCR Test Kit(Real time)
products.caption: This real-time PCR test kit is for qualitative detection of Mycobacterium tuberculosis viral DNA in human sputum specimens.
products.description: This real-time PCR test kit is for qualitative detection of Mycobacterium tuberculosis bacterial DNA in human sputum specimens. It can be used alongside other diagnostic methods, contributing to the final diagnosis of TB infection.
bullet_points: Specificity: no cross-reactivity with UU, MP and CP
Less or equal to 30 min. extraction and 1-hour PCR (extraction reagent included)

products.name: HLA-B27 PCR Test Kit(Real Time)
products.caption: HLA-B27 is strongly associated with ankylosing spondylitis (AS) and other related inflammatory diseases, such as psoriasis, inflammatory bowel disease and reactive arthritis.
products.description: This real-time PCR test kit is for the detection of Human leukocyte antigen B27 in whole blood. HLA-B27 is strongly associated with ankylosing spondylitis (AS) and other related inflammatory diseases, such as psoriasis, inflammatory bowel disease and reactive arthritis. Testing for HLA-B27 can aid in early diagnosis and management of these conditions.
bullet_points: Specificity: no cross-reactivity with other subtypes of HLA gene
Internal quality control: prevents false-negative results
Less or equal to 30 min. extraction and 1-hour PCR (extraction reagent included)

products.name: HPV 18 High-risk Types with 16/18 Genotyping Test Kit
products.caption: This real-time PCR kit determines the presence of HPV 16 and HPV 18 in cervical specimens, with results that differentiate between the two, and simultaneously screens for 16 other high-risk genotypes.
products.description: This PCR test kit is for the qualitative detection of 18 high-risk HPV types in cervical specimens. The test utilizes PCR technology to amplify target DNA and determine the presence of each viral type. Up to three test results are obtained per patient sample and provide the following information Specifically distinguish between the presence of HPV 16 and HPV 18 Screen for the presence of high-risk types: HPV 26, 31, 33, 35, 39, 45, 51, 52 53, 56, 58, 59, 66, 68, 73, 82 with one qualitative result The kit can be used in conjunction with clinical information derived from other diagnostic and screening tests, physical examinations and professional guidelines to guide patient management.
bullet_points: Determine the presence of 18 high-risk HPV types

Concordance:Demonstrated 98.5% relative sensitivity, 98.38% relative specificity, and 98.44% relative accuracy, when compared with a commercial PCR-reverse dot blot hybridization assay for the same viral types.Comparisons of only HPV 16 and HPV 18 demonstrated (respectively) sensitivity of 98.46% and 96.3%, specificity of 99.84% and 100%, and accuracy of 99.72% and 99.86%

Time to result Amplification/detection in 45 minutes; total time to result about 1.5 – 1.75 hours (including hands-on prep time, extraction and amplification/detection) Kit includes extraction reagent.

Specificity:No cross-reactivity with certain low-risk genotypes, including HPV 6, 11, 81, 61, 67, 69, 71, 40, 42, 43, 44, 83, 54, 72 or certain viruses and microorganisms, including HSV-Ⅱ, UU, NG, CT, CMV, EB, TP, TV, MH and CAL

products.name: Glucose
products.caption: Glucose is the major carbohydrate present in the peripheral blood. The oxidation of glucose is the major source of cellular energy in the body. Glucose determinations are run primarily to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of diabetes mellitus.
products.description: Glucose is the major carbohydrate present in the peripheral blood. The oxidation of glucose is the major source of cellular energy in the body. Glucose determinations are run primarily to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of diabetes mellitus. Elevated glucose levels may be associated with pancreatitis, pituitary or thyroid dysfunction, renal failure and liver disease, whereas low glucose levels may be associated with insulinoma, hypopituitarism, neoplasms, or insulin-induced-hypoglycemia.
bullet_points: Clinical significance:Glucose is the major carbohydrate present in the peripheral blood. The oxidation of glucose is the major source of cellular energy in the body. Glucose determinations are run primarily to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of diabetes mellitus. Elevated glucose levels may be associated with pancreatitis, pituitary or thyroid dysfunction, renal failure and liver disease, whereas low glucose levels may be associated with insulinoma, hypopituitarism, neoplasms, or insulin-induced-hypoglycemia.

Intended use:The Cypress Diagnostics kit Glucose is an in vitro diagnostic medical device intended to be used for the quantitative measurement of glucose in human fluoride plasma. The device is not automated. The measurement of glucose is intended to be used for screening for and diagnosis of (pre)diabetes, the diagnosis of hypoglycemia and the aid in diagnosis of non-diabetic hyperglycemia. This kit is intended to be used by healthcare professionals in a laboratory-based testing environment.

products.name: RPR carbon 150 t
products.caption: Syphilis is a chronic infection, caused by the spirochaete Treponema pallidum, which progresses through distinct stages of infection: primary, secondary, tertiary and quaternary
products.description: Syphilis is a chronic infection, caused by the spirochaete Treponema pallidum, which progresses through distinct stages of infection: primary, secondary, tertiary and quaternary. These stages produce diverse clinical symptoms, typically producing initial chancres then syphilitic rash followed by long periods of dormancy and may eventually lead to cardiovascular problems and neurosyphilis.
bullet_points: Clinical significance:Syphilis is a chronic infection, caused by the spirochaete Treponema pallidum, which progresses through distinct stages of infection: primary, secondary, tertiary and quaternary. These stages produce diverse clinical symptoms, typically producing initial chancres then syphilitic rash followed by long periods of dormancy and may eventually lead to cardiovascular problems and neurosyphilis. Tests for syphilis fall into four categories: direct microscopic examination; treponemal antibody tests; non-treponemal antibody tests and direct antigen tests. Non-treponemal test are important to follow up antibiotic therapies. If the therapy is efficient, non treponemal titers will significantly decrease. RPR carbon is one such test.

Intended use:The Cypress Diagnostics RPR Carbon kit is an in vitro diagnostic medical device intended to be used by healthcare professionals for the qualitative/semi-quantitative detection of Luetic reagins (non-treponemal antibodies) in human serum or plasma. The detection of Luetic reagins(non-treponemal antibodies) is intended to be used for the screening for and aid in diagnosis of syphilis and the monitoring of the effectiveness of syphilis therapy.

products.name: CYANVision
products.caption: The CYANVision is a semi-automatic biochemistry analyzer made to excel in clinical performance, user convenience, and robustness.
products.description: This super-compact analyzer uses light-emitting diodes (LED) to achieve unprecedented measurement performance. With guidance and advice, the operating system helps you deliver precise and accurate results.
bullet_points: Clinical significance:Based on our 25-year experience in in-vitro diagnostics, we created the CYANVision to excel in three different areas: clinical performance, user convenience, and robustness. With our new and innovative CYANVision, we set the benchmark for the industry. This super-compact analyzer uses light-emitting diodes (LED) to achieve unprecedented measurement performance. With guidance and advice, the operating system helps you deliver precise and accurate results.

Intended use:The CYANVision semi-automatic analyzer is an in-vitro diagnostic medical device for professional use only. (Semi-) automatic biochemistry analyzers are widely applied in hospitals and research institutes for the quantitative determination of different biochemical substances and other characteristics in various biological samples. Evaluation of these measured properties of blood and other fluids may be useful in the diagnosis of disease. The type of in vitro diagnostic tests that can be performed on this analyzer includes enzyme levels (such as many of the liver function tests), ion levels (e.g. sodium and potassium), and other tell-tale chemicals (such as glucose, serum albumin, or creatinine). Enzymes may be measured by the rate they change one colored substance to another; in these tests, the results for enzymes are given as an activity, not as a concentration of the enzyme. Other tests use colorimetric changes to determine the concentration of the chemical in question. Turbidity may also be measured. For the best results, we advise using Cypress Diagnostics reagents. The analyzer is delivered with all Cypress Diagnostics biochemistry test methods pre-programmed. These methods have been extensively verified and optimized. In the application sheets, you can find detailed information on the preparation of the samples and the execution of the tests for all Cypress Diagnostics kits. Using these pre-programmed methods and following the preparation instructions correctly, Cypress Diagnostics guarantees the accuracy and precision as stated in the kit’s insert.

products.name: AHG - Anti Human Globulin
products.caption: The CYANVision is a semi-automatic biochemistry analyzer made to excel in clinical performance, user convenience, and robustness.
products.description: This super-compact analyzer uses light-emitting diodes (LED) to achieve unprecedented measurement performance. With guidance and advice, the operating system helps you deliver precise and accurate results.
bullet_points: Intended use:Polyspecific Coombs serum for bloodgrouping serology contains antibodies against immunoglobulines and complement factors. This reagent has been prepared by blending polyclonal anti-IgG (produced by immunisation of rabbits with purified whole human IgG) with monoclonal Anti-C3 (cell line Bric-8) obtained by in vitro culture of an IgM immunoglobulin secreting mouse hybridoma. The form of preparation takes care, that no reaction with uncoated human erythrocytes take place. The reagent has been coloured green and contains also <0.1% (w/v) sodium azide as preservative. Beside the parts active antibody and human serum the reagent contains sodium chloride, macromolecules and bovine albumin. The reagent is intended be used by qualified and technical personnel only. For in vitro use only.

products.name: Creatine Kinase MB
products.caption: The Cypress Diagnostics kit Creatine Kinase MB is an in vitro diagnostic medical device intended to be used for the quantitative measurement of creatine kinase MB in human serum free of hemolysis or heparin plasma.
products.description: The Cypress Diagnostics kit Creatine Kinase MB is an in vitro diagnostic medical device intended to be used for the quantitative measurement of creatine kinase MB in human serum free of hemolysis or heparin plasma. The device is not automated. The measurement of creatine kinase MB is intended to be used to aid to identify acute infarct of myocardium disease or more rarely, skeletal muscle damage, in patient risk population. This kit is intended to be used by healthcare professionals in a laboratory-based testing environment
bullet_points: Clinical significance:CK-MB is composed of two moieties CK-M (from muscles) and CK-B (from brain). CK-MB is usually present in serum at low concentration; it is increased after an acute infarct or myocardium and later descends at normal levels. Rarely, it can also be increased in skeletal muscle damage.

Intended use:The Cypress Diagnostics kit Creatine Kinase MB is an in vitro diagnostic medical device intended to be used for the quantitative measurement of creatine kinase MB in human serum free of hemolysis or heparin plasma. The device is not automated. The measurement of creatine kinase MB is intended to be used to aid to identify acute infarct of myocardium disease or more rarely, skeletal muscle damage, in patient risk population. This kit is intended to be used by healthcare professionals in a laboratory-based testing environment

products.name: hCG - Card
products.caption: The Cypress Diagnostics hCG Card test is a test kit for the detection of hCG in urine, serum or plasma.
products.description: The Cypress Diagnostics hCG Card test is a test kit for the detection of hCG in urine, serum or plasma.
bullet_points: Clinical significance:During early stages of pregnancy, the fertilized ovum secretes a specific hormone, hCG (Human Chorionic Gonadotropin), which appears in urine, serum or plasma. The Cypress Diagnostics hCG Card test is a test kit for the detection of hCG in urine, serum or plasma.

Intended use:The Cypress Diagnostics test hCG Card is a rapid immunochromatographic test for the qualitative detection of human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) in human urine, serum or plasma. This test kit is to be used to obtain a visual qualitative result for early detection of pregnancy.

products.name: 2 parameters
products.caption: The Cypress Diagnostics Drug Screen card is a lateral flow, one-step panel immunoassay for the qualitative detection of multiple drug metabolites in human urine at the following cut-off concentrations: MOR: 300ng/mL THC: 50ng/mL
products.description: The Cypress Diagnostics Drug Screen card is a lateral flow, one-step panel immunoassay for the qualitative detection of multiple drug metabolites in human urine at the following cut-off concentrations: MOR: 300ng/mL THC: 50ng/mL This product is used to obtain a visual, qualitative result and is intended for professional use. The assay should not be used without proper supervision. This assay provides only a preliminary analytical test result. A more specific alternative chemical method must be used in order to obtain a confirmed analytical result. Gas chromatography/mass spectrometry (GC/MS) has been established as the preferred confirmatory method by the National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA).
bullet_points: Clinical significance:Urine based screened tests for drugs of abuse of abuse range from simple immunoassay tests to complex analytical procedures. The speed of immunoassays has made them the most widely accepted method for screening urine for drugs of abuse. Our Drug screen cards are based on the principle of highly specific immunochemical reactions of antibodies which are used for the analysis of specific compounds in biological fluids. The drug screen card is a rapid, visual, competitive panel immunoassay that can be used for the simultaneous, qualitative detection of multiple drug metabolites in human urine.

Intended use:The Cypress Diagnostics Drug Screen card is a lateral flow, one-step panel immunoassay for the qualitative detection of multiple drug metabolites in human urine at the following cut-off concentrations: MOR: 300ng/mL THC: 50ng/mL This product is used to obtain a visual, qualitative result and is intended for professional use. The assay should not be used without proper supervision. This assay provides only a preliminary analytical test result. A more specific alternative chemical method must be used in order to obtain a confirmed analytical result. Gas chromatography/mass spectrometry (GC/MS) has been established as the preferred confirmatory method by the National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA).

products.name: Iron
products.caption: The Cypress Diagnostics kit Iron is an in vitro diagnostic medical device intended to be used for the quantitative measurement of iron in human serum or heparinized plasma.
products.description: The Cypress Diagnostics kit Iron is an in vitro diagnostic medical device intended to be used for the quantitative measurement of iron in human serum or heparinized plasma.
bullet_points: Clinical significance:The Iron content of the human body may be divided into three classes: iron in storage, iron in use and iron in transport. Increases in serum iron levels may indicate increased erythrocyte destruction, decreased erythrocyte formation, increased absorption or defects in storage capacities. Decreases in serum iron levels may indicate Iron deficiency or inability to retrieve storage iron. Iron binding capacity is usually increased in iron deficiency anemia and decreased in hemochromatosis, malignancies, rheumatic fever, Hodgkin's diseases and collagen vascular disease

Intended use:The Cypress Diagnostics kit Iron is an in vitro diagnostic medical device intended to be used for the quantitative measurement of iron in human serum or heparinized plasma. The device is not automated. The measurement of iron is intended to be used to aid to identify iron-deficiency (anemia), hemochromatosis or liver disorders, in patient risk population. This kit is intended to be used by healthcare professionals in a laboratory-based testing environment.
